io.delta.core.helpers

Interface TableHelper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTableHelper

    public interface TableHelper
    Helper class which provides information needed by the Delta Core to load the Delta metadata

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • listFiles

        CloseableIterator<FileStatus> listFiles(FileStatus file)
                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Given the path return an interator of files from the file
        Parameters:
        file - Directory path
        Returns:
        Closeable iterator of files. It is the responsibility of the caller to close the iterator.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the given file is not found

      • readJsonFile

        CloseableIterator<ColumnarBatch> readJsonFile(FileStatus file,
                                              StructType readSchema)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Read the JSON format file at given location return the data.
        Parameters:
        file - FileStatus of the scan file.
        readSchema - Select list of columns to read from the JSON file.
        Returns:
        an iterator of data in columnar format. It is the responsibility of the caller to close the iterator.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs during the read.

      • readParquetFile

        CloseableIterator<ColumnarBatch> readParquetFile(FileStatus file,
                                                 java.util.Optional<ScanFileContext> scanFileContext,
                                                 ColumnMappingMode columnMappingMode,
                                                 StructType readSchema,
                                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> partitionValues)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Read the Parquet format file at given location and return the data.
        Parameters:
        file - FileStatus of the scan file.
        scanFileContext - Optional connector specific scan file context.
        columnMappingMode - How to look up the given columns in readSchema in Parquet file?
        readSchema - Select list of columns to read from the Parquet file.
        partitionValues - Key value map of partition column and partition value pairs.
        Returns:
        an iterator of data in columnar format. It is the responsibility of the caller to close the iterator.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs during the read.

      • readFile

        java.io.DataInputStream readFile(FileStatus file)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Open the given file for reading and return an input stream
        Parameters:
        file - to be opened
        Returns:
        DataInputStream. It is the responsibility of the caller to close the stream once done with it.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs in opening the given file.

      • getExpressionEvaluator

        ExpressionEvaluator getExpressionEvaluator(StructType schema,
                                           Expression expression)
        Return an expression evaluator for given schema and expression. The returned evaluator takes a ColumnarBatch as input and returns the expression output as a ColumnVector.
        Parameters:
        schema - expected schema of the input ColumnarBatch to returned evaluator
        expression - to evaluate.
        Returns:
        ExpressionEvaluator

      • parseJson

        Row parseJson(java.lang.String json,
              StructType schema)
        Helper method to parse the JSON given as string and return the result as Row.
        Parameters:
        json - JSON in string format
        schema - Subset of columns to read from the JSON
        Returns:
